originalText.text: I got my wedding dress altered here today. They also did my fianc√©‚Äôs pants and jacket and it was perfect. They even ironed it after seeing a small wrinkle on his jackets. Will absolutely come back to this neighborhood gem üíé

originalText.text:
My two experiences have been splendid. The moment I passed by, I can feel the good vibes through the window. The staff are patient, respectful, friendly and most of all: Consistent. They get the job according to schedule, and are kind enough to send you a nice reminder for pick up, unlike other places where you have to remember on your own- especially for those of us that have busy lives

The people working there don‚Äôt have dingy aura‚Äôs, unlike other places I‚Äôve been to, and don‚Äôt have worn out demeanor, ‚Äú this is just just work‚Äù type of attitude. Since my first two experiences, I haven‚Äôt gone to another place since. Life is short, and even a 5-7 minute interaction with a delightful experience counts in todays world

originalText.text: This location on 145th provides great tailoring and dry cleaning but most importantly great customer service. Thank you to the entire staff for your attentiveness.

text.text: This location on 145th provides great tailoring and dry cleaning but most importantly great customer service. Thank you to the entire staff for your attentiveness.

originalText.text: Not only kindness always the way here, so is top-quality work. And besides the continued excellence with routine service, they got out two stubborn specila-assignment stains for me that a competitor couldn't.

text.text: Not only kindness always the way here, so is top-quality work. And besides the continued excellence with routine service, they got out two stubborn specila-assignment stains for me that a competitor couldn't.

originalText.text: The tailor at the St Nicholas Ave/147th Street location is stellar; he really cares about the quality of his work.  Pricing is reasonable also.  Dry cleaning good also.  Highly recommend!
